## Public Member Functions

### createExprForCAPIVariantKind() {#acf3e0563ec30bb753fe338dc8be818b6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const MCExpr &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMMachORelocationInfo.cpp&#125;::ARMMachORelocationInfo::createExprForCAPIVariantKind (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; SubExpr, unsigned VariantKind)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Create an MCExpr for the target-specific <code>VariantKind</code>.

The VariantKinds are defined in <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/disassembler-h">llvm-c/Disassembler.h</a>. Used by MCExternalSymbolizer. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
If possible, an MCExpr corresponding to VariantKind, else 0.
</SectionUser>
